channel.title: RH Forecast on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in RH Forecast on FinanClub

item.title: CC
item.description: score:-190 Chances: Chemours Co. delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 6.90% and 0.69% respectively for the quarter ended December 2023. The furniture retailer RH forecasted customer demand would pick up this year as interest rates ease. Risks: The review identified “material weaknesses” in its internal control over financial reporting and resulted in revisions of its balance sheet as of Dec.
